answers.answer: All medical services and medicines necessary for the treatment of COVID-19 are covered by the FNUASS for insured, uninsured, and other persons diagnosed in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Patients with COVID-19'.

answers.answer: People in Romania showing COVID-19 symptoms can access remote consultations offered by their family doctor or a specialist doctor.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Patients with COVID-19'.

answers.answer: To receive medical services in evaluation centers, individuals must have confirmed infection via a rapid antigen or NAAT/RT-PCR test on the Corona Forms platform, not require oxygen therapy, have mild or moderate COVID-19 symptoms, and possess at least 2 risk factors, without needing a referral note.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Measures for patients with COVID - 19'.

answers.answer: The 'Post-Covid-19 Syndrome Evaluation' service, available during day hospitalization, helps patients who continue to experience symptoms for a long period, even after a mild form of the disease.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Post-Covid-19 Syndrome Evaluation'.

answers.answer: Patients with moderate or severe respiratory insufficiency after COVID-19, or those who passed through a SARS-CoV-2 triage system, can benefit from a continuous oxygen administration device like an oxygen concentrator. Details on obtaining these devices are in the 'Medical devices chapter'.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Medical devices chapter'.

answers.answer: Patients with certain unspecified conditions may benefit from noninvasive ventilation after COVID-19.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Medical devices chapter'.

answers.answer: Patients with post-COVID-19 conditions can benefit from physical therapy, psychological counseling, and psychotherapy, provided they have a recommendation from cardiology and pneumology doctors.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Patients with post-COVID-19 conditions'.

answers.answer: Post-COVID-19 physical therapy and psychological counseling services are covered by the health insurance system if the doctors providing them work in clinics contracted with the health insurance house.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Patients with post-COVID-19 conditions'.

answers.answer: The procedure for accessing medical services is detailed in the 'Specialist Doctor chapter'.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Specialist Doctor chapter'.

answers.answer: Individuals can find locations for COVID-19 vaccination in Bucharest by downloading a list of family medicine offices.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Addresses where you can get covid vaccination in Bucharest'.

answers.answer: One can download the list of family medicine offices for COVID-19 vaccination in Bucharest by clicking the 'Download List' link provided on the page.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/patients-with-covid-19 and read the section under 'Addresses where you can get covid vaccination in Bucharest'.
